accussed_details.name: Iffat Sultana
allegation: Dispute over resumption of excess land

complaint_summary: Petitioner disputed the resumption of excess land under the Land Reforms Act, II of 1977, claiming incorrect calculation of P.I. Units and improper implementation of her choice of land surrender.
investigation_summary: The Deputy Land Commissioner determined the petitioner’s holding at 9936 P.I. Units and ordered resumption of 1936 P.I. Units. Petitioner surrendered excess land in 1977 but later disputed the calculation and implementation of her choice of surrender.
judgment_summary: The court rejected the petitioner's claim regarding the choice of land surrender, confirming that her declaration form indicated surrender of land in village Walla Rai. However, the Deputy Land Commissioner was directed to recheck the calculation of P.I. Units and soil classification in the presence of the petitioner or her counsel.
Decision_or_verdict: Petition rejected; recalculation of P.I. Units ordered.
legal_arguments: Petitioner argued incorrect calculation of P.I. Units.
Petitioner claimed improper implementation of choice for land surrender.
sections: Rule 13(3) of Punjab Land Reforms Rules, 1977

witness_statement.Sardar Fazal Abbas: Confirmed petitioner’s surrender of land in village Walla Rai as per declaration form.

key_issues: Dispute over choice of land surrender

legal_terms.P.I. Units: Productivity Index Units used for land valuation.

words_and_phrases.Resumption of excess land: Process of reclaiming land exceeding permissible limits under land reforms.

summary_vector_notes: Petitioner challenged the resumption of excess land under Land Reforms Act, II of 1977, citing incorrect calculation of P.I. Units and improper implementation of her choice for land surrender. The court upheld the original decision but ordered recalculation of P.I. Units.

issues.choice_of_area_surrendered: Dispute over land surrendered in village Walla Rai versus village Jhalar Mehr Shah
issues.calculation_of_p_i_units: Claim of incorrect calculation and soil classification

petitioner.choice_of_area: Requested resumption of 1436 P.I. Units from village Jhalar Mehr Shah and 500 P.I. Units from village Walla Rai
petitioner.calculation_error: Claimed incorrect calculation of P.I. Units and soil classification

findings.choice_of_area: Original declaration form indicated surrender of land in village Walla Rai; petition rejected on this point
findings.calculation_error: Deputy Land Commissioner directed to review records and report if necessary

directions.review_records: Deputy Land Commissioner to review relevant records in presence of petitioner or counsel
